Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Enacts the New York state fair tenant credit reporting act
Summary: Enacts the New York state fair tenant credit reporting act to ensure that negative credit reporting by landlords can only occur under fair and transparent circumstances.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to enacting the New York state fair tenant credit reporting act
